features: NEW & IMPROVED: The best-selling organic cotton tampon on Amazon, now even better than ever! Made from 100% organic cotton with a new plant-based applicator and an updated design that expands widthwise for ultra confident leak protection. Packaging may vary.

100% ORGANIC COTTON: Tampons made from 100% certified organic cotton – because what you put in your body matters. Made without pesticides, dioxins, rayon, or chlorine; free of fragrance and dyes. FSA/HSA Eligible.
NEW PLANT-BASED APPLICATOR: Sleek, plant-based* compact applicator made from renewable resources for smooth, comfortable insertion. *minimum 92% plant-based plastic

EXPANDS AND PROTECTS: Gently expands to absorb from all angles for a worry-free, comfortable fit and ultra reliable leak protection –so you can roll with your flow. All absorbencies available for light to heavy flows: Light, Regular, Super, Super Plus, and Variety Packs.

EVERY BODY DESERVES COMFORT: We believe everyone should have access to period care–full stop. So, with each Cora purchase, we provide period products and body literacy resources to people who might otherwise go without.
100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: If you are not 100% delighted by our goods, reach out to us and we’ll make it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hoover Damn of the Red River
reviews.reviewText: These things blocked my beaver up better than any other damn product I’ve ever tried. 5 stars for blocking my flow like a climate protester blocks busy traffic. 4.5 stars for the color changing affect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite. Would continue to repurchase. No unnecessary ingredients. These are clean and safe to use and I’m very happy with them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No chemicals and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Favorite tampons from now on. Zero chemicals and organic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars they used to be wayy smaller
reviews.reviewText: I have been using CORA tampons for like the last year or so and have never ordered any but I saw that they were cheaper. Tell me why I received them and they came in plastic packaging and were noticeably bigger. The regular is almost as big as the Super used to be and the Super is wayy bigger. The light ones are close to how they used to be but are def bigger. I don't know if this is like a dupe version and I got scammed or something. They could have changed the way they make them but idk.. They are not impossibly big or anything, I am still going to use them but the size difference is kinda noticeable (coming from someone who doesn't tend to notice these kinds of things).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable and effective
reviews.reviewText: I also moved over to non-chlorinated panty liners that have been wonderful and a menstrual cup, but I am still hugely relieved at how great these are. I'm very chemical-sensitive and have had years of itching, dryness, and infections particularly around my period. I finally caved and bought these to try out and I'm actually a little angry that this was such a simple fix. I have a very heavy flow and I usually use both pads and tampons. These worked perfectly and were much less irritating than normal tampons. For the first time in years I had a period (several now) without any itching, no irritation, no infections, and minimal discomfort. these tampons are as or possibly more absorbant than the ones you buy at the store and the price isn't as prohibitive as it could be. I'm never going back to chlorinated or chemically treated menstrual products and neither should you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleaner product that is just as effective.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve trying to switch out toxic items in my home for those that are clean/cleaner. I never realized how many ingredients are in tampons! I did extensive research and couldn’t find a clean tampon that everyone seemed to love. I decided to try these and I’m pleased with them. I had no issues with insertion, leaking or the tampons being uncomfortable. All the reviews I read previously had either raved, or complained about those issues. I will say, these work just as well as my toxic alternative and I’d repurchase. Clean products cost more, so if it’s important to you to limit your body’s exposure to chemicals, pay the extra cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Life changing Tampons!!!
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I feel as if these tampons changed my life! I bought these tampons because they were organic cotton and I read that they can help menstrual cramps (not scientifically proven... however... once I started using these, I barely had any cramps!) With "normal" tampons, I was going through SO many and felt miserable! My flow was like a crime scene that lasted a minimum of 5 days! Once I began using these, my cramps were manageable (I felt it so I knew SHE was coming but I could still function with my everyday life). I only went through about 10 tampons per period and the remainder of the time I would just use a panty liner. I have been using these tampons for about 5 months and I highly recommend! Just a side note, the tampons aren't that absorbent so I change them frequently; however, they are worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than most tampons
reviews.reviewText: Did you know that ingredients to tampons and pads aren’t required to be listed OR even regulated???I was horrified when I found out that I had NO idea what I had been putting into my body—into my vagina no less.Anyway that’s what led me here, to purchasing 100% cotton organic tampons. I wanted to wait to review until I’d used them for two periods, and let me tell you my friends these are SO awesome.I have had no problems with them pulling apart as other reviewers have mentioned. Even when totally full, inserting and removing them is done just like with any other tampon.These cotton ones might even be MORE absorbent than other popular brands as they seem to last me longer. They are small and compact, easily fit into a pocket.My favorite part is that I know what I’m putting into my body with these.
